abilities.name: Aggressive.
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

abilities.name: Gruumsh's Fury.
abilities.description: The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The orc is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy
* 1st level (4 slots): bless, command
* 2nd level (2 slots): augury, spiritual weapon (spear)
